trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 醒魂师明掌

trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Backup 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following ability until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 后援1（当此生物进战场时，在目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。若后者是另一个生物，则它获得下文之异能直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·1 | Bright-Palm, Soul Awakener | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on target creature. That creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当此生物攻击时，将目标生物上的+1/+1指示物数量加倍。该生物本回合不能被力量等于或小于2的生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a Phyrexian creature or artifact creature spell, incubate X, where X is that spell's mana value. (Create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and "{2}: Transform this artifact." It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放非瑞人生物或神器生物咒语时，抚育X，X为该咒语的法术力值。（派出一个上面有X个+1/+1指示物的抚育器衍生物，且具有「{2}：转化此神器。」它转化为0/0非瑞人神器生物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·2 | Brimaz, Blight of Oreskos | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each end step, if a Phyrexian died under your control this turn, proliferate.
trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有非瑞人在你的操控下死去，则增殖。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·53 | The Great Aerie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, bolster 3. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put three +1/+1 counters on it.)
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入王龙巢和在你的维持开始时，振励3。（于由你操控的生物中选择一个防御力最小的生物，在其上放置三个+1/+1指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·53 | The Great Aerie | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, choose up to one target creature you control and up to one target creature an opponent controls. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its toughness to the other.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，选择至多一个目标由你操控的生物和至多一个目标由对手操控的生物。这些生物各向对方造成等同于本身防御力的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·54 | Inys Haen | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 河岸海恩

trans-unit.resname: MOC·54 | Inys Haen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, mill three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入河岸海恩和在你的维持开始时，磨三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·54 | Inys Haen | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk away from CARDNAME, each player returns all land cards from their graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换出河岸海恩时，每位牌手各将所有地牌从其坟墓场横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·54 | Inys Haen | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, return target nonland card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，将目标非地牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·55 | Ketria | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 克崔亚

trans-unit.resname: MOC·55 | Ketria | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, put your choice of a vigilance, menace, or trample counter on target creature you control.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入克崔亚和在你的维持开始时，在目标由你操控的生物上依你的选择放置一个警戒，威慑或践踏指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·55 | Ketria | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland permanent card. Put that card onto the battlefield or into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，从你牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张非地永久物牌为止。将该牌放进战场或置于你手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·56 | Littjara | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 利雅拉

trans-unit.resname: MOC·56 | Littjara | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, create a 2/2 blue Shapeshifter creature token with changeling. (It is every creature type.)
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入利雅拉和在你的维持开始时，派出一个2/2蓝色，具化形异能的变形兽衍生生物。（它是所有生物类别。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·56 | Littjara | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, choose a creature type. Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control of that type.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，选择一种生物类别。在每个由你操控的该类别生物上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·57 | Megaflora Jungle | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 巨植丛林

trans-unit.resname: MOC·57 | Megaflora Jungle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature with mana value 2 or less gets +2/+2.
trans-unit.target: 每个法术力等于或小于2的生物均得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·57 | Megaflora Jungle | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出一个1/1绿色，名称为蝴蝶，具飞行异能的昆虫衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·58 | Naktamun | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 拿塔蒙

trans-unit.resname: MOC·58 | Naktamun | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature card in your graveyard has embalm. Its embalm cost is equal to its mana cost. (Exile a creature card from your graveyard and pay its embalm cost: Create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a white Zombie in addition to its other types with no mana cost. Embalm only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的每张生物牌均具有遗存异能。其遗存费用等同于其法术力费用。（从你的坟墓场放逐一张生物牌并支付其遗存费用：派出一个为其复制品的生物，但它是白色灵俑且没有法术力费用。只能于法术时机遗存。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·58 | Naktamun | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，你可以弃一张牌。若你如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·59 | New Argive | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 新阿基夫

trans-unit.resname: MOC·59 | New Argive | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a historic creature you control attacks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn. (Artifacts, legendaries, and Sagas are historic.)
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控的史迹生物攻击时，它得+2/+2直到回合结束。（神器、传奇和传纪是史迹。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·59 | New Argive | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a historic card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张史迹牌为止。将该牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·60 | Norn's Seedcore | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 艾蕾侬的树种核心

trans-unit.resname: MOC·60 | Norn's Seedcore | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME, chaos ensues.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入艾蕾侬的树种核心时，引发混沌。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·60 | Norn's Seedcore | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, reveal cards from the top of your planar deck until you reveal a plane card. Planeswalk to it, except don't planeswalk away from any plane. Put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of your planar deck in any order.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，从你时空套牌顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张时空牌为止。时空换入该处，但不时空换出任一时空。将其余所展示的牌以任意顺序置于你时空套牌底。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·61 | Nyx | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 尼兹

trans-unit.resname: MOC·61 | Nyx | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nontoken creatures are enchantments in addition to their other types.
trans-unit.target: 非衍生物的生物都额外具有结界此类别。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·61 | Nyx | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 星彩～每当一个结界在你的操控下进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·61 | Nyx | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, choose a color. Add an amount of mana of that color equal to your devotion to that color.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，选择一种颜色。加若干该色法术力，其数量等同于你的该色献力。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·62 | Paliano | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 帕兰诺

trans-unit.resname: MOC·62 | Paliano | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if there is no monarch, you become the monarch.
trans-unit.target: 当由你操控的一个或数个生物对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，若此时没有君主，则你成为君主。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·62 | Paliano | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and haste.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出一个1/1黑色，具死触与敏捷异能的杀手衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·63 | The Pit | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 暗渊

trans-unit.resname: MOC·63 | The Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME, each player creates their choice of a 3/3 white Angel creature token with flying or a 6/6 black Demon creature token with flying, trample, and "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice another creature. If you can't, this creature deals 6 damage to you."
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入暗渊时，每位牌手各依其选择派出一个3/3白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物；或6/6黑色恶魔衍生生物，且具有飞行、践踏与「在你的维持开始时，牺牲另一个生物。若你无法如此作，则此生物对你造成6点伤害」的恶魔衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·63 | The Pit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, each player sacrifices a nonartifact creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，每位牌手各牺牲一个非神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·64 | Riptide Island | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 激流岛

trans-unit.source: When you planeswalk to CARDNAME and at the beginning of your upkeep, create two 1/1 colorless Sliver creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 当你时空换入激流岛和在你的维持开始时，派出两个1/1无色裂片妖衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·64 | Riptide Island | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, Slivers you control gain haste and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，直到回合结束，由你操控的裂片妖获得敏捷异能且得+X/+X，X为由你操控的裂片妖数量。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·65 | Strixhaven | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 斯翠海文

trans-unit.resname: MOC·65 | Strixhaven | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells players cast have demonstrate. (Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, they may copy it. If they do, they choose an opponent to also copy it. Players may choose new targets for their copies.)
trans-unit.target: 牌手施放的瞬间和法术咒语都具有示范异能。（每当牌手施放瞬间或法术咒语时，其可以将它复制。若其如此作，则其选择一位对手一同复制。牌手可以为各自的复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·65 | Strixhaven | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, return up to one target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，将至多一张目标瞬间或法术牌从坟墓场移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·66 | Ten Wizards Mountain | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 十巫山

trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll the planar die, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当你掷时空骰时，在至多一个目标生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·66 | Ten Wizards Mountain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，由你操控的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·67 | Towashi | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 都和市

trans-unit.resname: MOC·67 | Towashi | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Modified creatures you control have trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card." (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且有饰装的生物具有践踏与「每当此生物对任一牌手或鹏洛客造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。」（武具，指示物，以及由你操控的灵气均为饰装。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·67 | Towashi | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，将三个+1/+1指示物分配给一个，两个或三个目标由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·68 | Unyaro | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 文亚若

trans-unit.resname: MOC·68 | Unyaro | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, if you planeswalked to CARDNAME this turn, untap all creatures. They phase out until a player planeswalks. (Treat them and anything attached to them as though they didn't exist.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，若你是于本回合中时空换入文亚若，则重置所有生物。它们跃离直到有牌手时空换境为止。（它们及贴附其上的所有东西都视作不存在。）

trans-unit.resname: MOC·68 | Unyaro | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create two 2/2 white and blue Knight creature tokens with vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，派出两个2/2白蓝双色，具警戒异能的骑士衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 英勇巅

trans-unit.target: 每当你的队伍以正好两个生物攻击时，这些生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·69 | Valor's Reach | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, untap up to two target creatures your team controls. If it's a main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase, followed by an additional main phase.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，重置至多两个目标由你队伍操控的生物。如果是在行动阶段中，则在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段，以及接于其后之一个额外的行动阶段。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·70 | The Western Cloud | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, create three tapped Treasure tokens. They each deal 1 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.

trans-unit.resname: MOC·71 | The Wilds | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever chaos ensues, target player sacrifices a creature. If they do, you create a Food token. You create two Food tokens instead if the sacrificed creature's toughness was 4 or greater.
trans-unit.target: 每当引发混沌时，目标牌手牺牲一个生物。若其如此作，则你派出一个食品衍生物。如果所牺牲生物的防御力等于或大于4，则改为你派出两个食品衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOC·72 | Elspeth's Talent | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of enchanted planeswalker, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: MOC·73 | Firemane Commando | Card Text | Paragraph 3

Enchant planeswalker
Enchanted planeswalker has "−12: You get an emblem with ‘
You may activate loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control on any player's turn any time you could cast an instant.'"

trans-unit.source: Enchanted planeswalker has "+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order."

trans-unit.target: (于围攻进战场时，选择一位对手来防卫之。你和其他牌手能攻击围攻。当围攻失守时，将它放逐，然后你施放已转化的此牌。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Invasion of Kamigawa | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target artifact or creature an opponent controls and put a stun counter on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 当进军神河进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的神器或生物并在其上放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 屋顶破坏者

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MOM·62 | Rooftop Saboteurs | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player or battle, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当屋顶破坏者对任一牌手或战役造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Invasion of Segovia | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Invasion of Segovia | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 当进军塞哥维亚进战场时，派出两个1/1蓝色，具践踏异能的巨海兽衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 你施放的非生物咒语具有召集异能。（这些咒语能用你的生物来协助施放。你于施放非生物咒语时每横置一个生物，就能为此咒语支付{1}或一点该生物颜色之法术力。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·63 | Caetus, Sea Tyrant of Segovia | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, untap up to four target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置至多四个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell with mana value 3 or greater, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放法术力值等于或大于3的非生物咒语时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | Jin-Gitaxias | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if you have seven or more cards in hand.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：放逐金吉塔厦，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限你有七张或更多手牌时。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I — Draw cards equal to the number of cards in your hand. You have no maximum hand size for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: I — 抓等同于你手牌数量的牌。于你操控伟大合成的时段内，你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: II — Return all non-Phyrexian creatures to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: II — 将所有不是非瑞人的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·65 | The Great Synthesis | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: III — You may cast any number of spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: III — 你可以从你手上施放任意数量的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。放逐伟大合成，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Herald of Invasion | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {5}{PB}: Transform Rona. Activate only as a sorcery. ({PB} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
trans-unit.target: {5}{B/P}：转化罗娜。只能于法术时机起动。（{B/P}可用{B}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.resname: MOM·295 | Rona, Tolarian Obliterator | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a source deals damage to CARDNAME, that source's controller exiles a card from their hand at random. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Otherwise, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个来源对陶拉里亚抹煞兽罗娜造成伤害时，该来源的操控者随机从其手上放逐一张牌。若它是地牌，则你可以将之在你的操控下放进战场。若否，则你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature or artifact: CARDNAME deals X damage to target opponent or battle and you gain X life, where X is the sacrificed permanent's mana value.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物或神器：世境寡人阿娅拉向目标对手或战役造成X点伤害且你获得X点生命，X为所牺牲永久物的法术力值。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Widow of the Realm | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: {5}{R/P}：转化阿娅拉。只能于法术时机起动。（{R/P}可用{R}或2点生命来支付。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·296 | Ayara, Furnace Queen | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，将至多一张目标神器或生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时将它放逐。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 希欧蕊

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 威慑

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature or planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: 当希欧蕊进战场时，每位对手各牺牲一个非衍生物的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | Sheoldred | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {4}{B}: Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield transformed under its owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery and only if an opponent has eight or more cards in their graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {4}{B}：放逐希欧蕊，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限任一对手的坟墓场中有八张或更多牌时。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 化真经文

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: (As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter.)
trans-unit.target: （于此传纪进战场时及于你抓牌步骤后，加一个学问指示物。）

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: I — For each opponent, destroy up to one target creature or planeswalker that player controls.
trans-unit.target: I — 为每位对手各进行以下流程～消灭至多一个目标由该牌手操控的生物或鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: II — Each opponent discards three cards, then mills three cards.
trans-unit.target: II — 每位对手各弃三张牌，然后各磨三张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·297 | The True Scriptures | Card Text | Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: III — Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Exile CARDNAME, then return it to the battlefield (front face up).
trans-unit.target: III — 将所有坟墓场中的所有生物牌在你的操控下放进战场。放逐化真经文，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·298 | Etali, Primal Conqueror | Card Text | Paragraph 3

trans-unit.target: {R}：放逐洼巴司，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场且已转化。只能于法术时机起动，且仅限你施放过三个或更多瞬间和／或法术咒语的回合。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·299 | The Great Work | Card Name

trans-unit.target: III — 直到回合结束，你可以从任意坟墓场中施放瞬间和法术咒语。若以此法施放的咒语将进入坟墓场，则改为将它放逐。放逐伟大志业，然后将它移回战场（移回时为正面朝上）。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·301 | The Grand Evolution | Card Name

trans-unit.target: II — 将七个+1/+1指示物分配给任意数量之目标由你操控的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·301 | The Grand Evolution | Card Text | Paragraph 4

trans-unit.resname: MOM·302 | Baral and Kari Zev | Card Name

trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant or sorcery spell each turn, you may cast a spell with lesser mana value that shares a card type with it from your hand without paying its mana cost. If you don't, create First Mate Ragavan, a legendary 2/1 red Monkey Pirate creature token. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间或法术咒语时，你可以从你手上施放一个法术力值比它小、又与之具共通牌张类别的咒语，且不需支付其法术力费用。若你未如此作，则派出传奇衍生生物勒格文大副，其为2/1红色的猴／海盗。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 每当咕噜力莫与夫毕佐进战场或攻击时，抓一张牌，然后你可以弃任意数量的地牌。每当你以此法弃一张或数张牌时，咕噜力莫与夫毕佐对目标生物造成该数量两倍的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MOM·303 | Borborygmos and Fblthp | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: MOM·304 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: MOM·304 | Djeru and Hazoret | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, look at the top six cards of your library. You may exile a legendary creature card from among them. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Until end of turn, you may cast the exiled card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 每当杰鲁与哈佐蕾攻击时，检视你牌库顶的六张牌。你可以放逐其中一张传奇生物牌。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。直到回合结束，你可以施放所放逐的牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·192 | Umori, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Companion — Each nonland card in your starting deck shares a card type. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 行侣～你起始套牌中各非地牌之间均具有共通的牌张类别。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以在法术时机下支付{3}来将它从游戏外置于你手上。）

trans-unit.resname: MUL·192 | Umori, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a card type.
trans-unit.target: 于集晶流浆乌墨理进战场时，选择一种牌张类别。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·192 | Umori, the Collector | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的该类别咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·193 | Yarok, the Desecrated | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 秽灵雅若克

trans-unit.resname: MUL·193 | Yarok, the Desecrated | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 死触，系命

trans-unit.resname: MUL·193 | Yarok, the Desecrated | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If a permanent entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控之永久物具有的触发式异能因永久物进战场而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·194 | Yorion, Sky Nomad | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 游空牧鸟约力昂

trans-unit.resname: MUL·194 | Yorion, Sky Nomad | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Companion — Your starting deck contains at least twenty cards more than the minimum deck size. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 行侣～你起始套牌中包含之牌张数量须比套牌数量下限多至少二十张。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以在法术时机下支付{3}来将它从游戏外置于你手上。）

trans-unit.resname: MUL·194 | Yorion, Sky Nomad | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MUL·194 | Yorion, Sky Nomad | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When Yorion enters the battlefield, exile any number of other nonland permanents you own and control. Return those cards to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 当约力昂进战场时，放逐任意数量由你拥有且操控的其他非地永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将这些牌移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·195 | Zirda, the Dawnwaker | Card Name
trans-unit.target: 熠晓灵狐泽尔达

trans-unit.resname: MUL·195 | Zirda, the Dawnwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Companion — Each permanent card in your starting deck has an activated ability. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 行侣～你起始套牌中各永久物牌均具有起动式异能。（如果你选择这张牌作为你的行侣，则你可以在法术时机下支付{3}来将它从游戏外置于你手上。）

trans-unit.resname: MUL·195 | Zirda, the Dawnwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Abilities you activate that aren't mana abilities cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
trans-unit.target: 你起动之不属于法术力异能的异能减少{2}来起动。此效应无法将该费用中的法术力减少到少于一点法术力。

trans-unit.resname: MUL·195 | Zirda, the Dawnwaker | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：目标生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
